title: Poppy R should display its AOE
body:
I know the boards don't like poppy very much, but the boards also like visual clarity, so hopefully the two cancel out. 

Poppy R has a Circular AOE around the person it hits first (The Hammer that pops out of the ground), but the telegraph on the ground doesn't show the area of effect and I feel like that would only be fair

replies.body: The size of the projectile itself pretty much offsets the need for an AOE indicator. It's so big that the only way it wouldn't hit you is if she wiffs it. If you're in the center of it, you know it's coming.
Sorry if I wasn't clear, I'm say that the targeting indicator placed on the ground (On the poppy players screen) doesn't show how big of an area the ultimate will affect
